tool_description: Monitors metric values against predefined thresholds and generates alerts when violations occur, supporting multiple threshold types and conditions.

metric_values.description: Array of metric values to monitor

threshold_type.description: Type of threshold: static, dynamic, percentile

error_messages: Empty metric values: Provide non-empty array of numeric values to monitor.
Invalid threshold type: Use one of [static, dynamic, percentile].
Invalid threshold config: Configuration values must be appropriate for the threshold type.
Insufficient data: Need sufficient metric values for threshold evaluation.
usage: Provide metric_values array and configure threshold_type with appropriate threshold_config values. Returns violation alerts and threshold status.

threshold_status.description: Overall threshold status: normal, warning, critical
